TopicTitle: Fallout New Kerbin - Two nations go nuclear (Episode #07 of World War 'K')

Articles.Content:
The events of the previous 6 episodes of World War 'K' have culminated in the start of a second series, and with it, a new bad-ass short-episode/trailer/teaser/thing.

For those of you who haven't seen the previous episodes: Two 'nations', the Elysian Empire and the Styx Corporation. The Styx managed to get a nuclear weapon in orbit last episode.

The editing is a little janky in places, I was way overdue for this episode. Never-the-less I hope you enjoy my 'video-art-fan-work-thing'.

Daaaaaaaaaaamn.

Aside from the animation with the Kerbals, the rest was amazing!

That was absolutely brilliant!

I don't know how you managed to get all the planes lines up for launch, but it was amazing!

Well done!

LOL! I love it! XD

And how do you do to launch all these rockets at the same time?
Wow, that was awesome. Easily the best war-based Kerbal video I've seen.

Aside from the animation with the Kerbals, the rest was amazing!

I suck at rigging, there was going to be more shots of them moving but I got so fed up with it I ended up doing a little too much of a bodge-job. Could have copied the scene lighting and then colour-matched it in better as well. Live and learn.

Thanks y'all for the compliments! I think I might do these pieces every season change.

LOL! I love it! XD

And how do you do to launch all these rockets at the same time?

It looks like they are just the same footage of the rocket launch 'copied and pasted' next to each other.

Also, the Kerbal with the mustache looks like Chris Hadfield!

This. Is. AWESOME!

Also, like the reference to Fallout: New Vegas in the title. Big Fallout nerd here. Can't wait for season 2.
That is officially my favorite video and I can't wait until Season Two You've made a kerbal happy.

Also, the Kerbal with the mustache looks like Chris Hadfield!

I was going for WWI British handlebar, but oh hells yes.

As for the multi-craft: post-production. The rocket launches you can see the edge of the masks (not my best edit, got rushed) however I am a lot more proud of the 3 harriers taking off, much better edit there.

Thanks for all the compliments guys! Episode 8 (2-1) will be less amazing as I was intending to use KAS and DR with are both down from the update. Still, I hope to at least build-up into seasons 2 with some information about the fragile political climate.

I was going for WWI British handlebar, but oh hells yes.

As for the multi-craft: post-production. The rocket launches you can see the edge of the masks (not my best edit, got rushed) however I am a lot more proud of the 3 harriers taking off, much better edit there.

Thanks for all the compliments guys! Episode 8 (2-1) will be less amazing as I was intending to use KAS and DR with are both down from the update. Still, I hope to at least build-up into seasons 2 with some information about the fragile political climate.

I can not wait to see it!

What happened to episodes 2 and 15?

I believe they were taken down because of the evil copyright monster.

So it begins.

Edited August 5, 2014 by EnterStyx
